programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke discusses Boris Yeltsin's resignation and Mr Putin's praise of the KGB.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cook discusses the global televised countdown to the millennium; Russian president Boris Yeltsin's resignation, and the audacity of Mr Putin in praising the Soviet secret police.
